name: Songkran Goggles Blueprint
description: Put on this pair of swim goggles and become a shining star on the beach! Enjoy the Songkran festival, adventurer!

name: Soufflé Ribbon - Lemon
description: Candy Master's masterpiece - a romantic and girlish soufflé ribbon! Infused with the sweet fragrance of dessert. Wear this to transform into the loveliest kitty girl in the school yard and garner the love of the entire playground. This one exhibits a sunny yellow.

name: Soufflé Ribbon - Matcha
description: Candy Master's masterpiece - a romantic and girlish soufflé ribbon! Infused with the sweet fragrance of dessert. Wear this to transform into the loveliest kitty girl in the school yard and garner the love of the entire playground. This one exhibits a refreshing brown.

name: Soul Breath
description: The sound of a soul's chilling breath. When it touches a living being, it petrifies and freezes to the bone.

name: Soul Peace
description: Soul Peace necklace exclusively designed by Warlock Association.

name: South Gate Material Pack
description: South Gate Material Pack, in which all kinds of South Gate materials can be found.

name: South Gate Picnic Pad
description: A picnic pad with the style and design of the south gate. It's comfortable to use.

name: Sparkle Firework
description: This is a real firecracker, don't be so close because it is cute. I'm not trying to bluff you, count to 3, then Biu~ it will be gone.

name: Sparrow Feather Beret
description: Yellow Sparrow's feather can hold the temperature under extreme weather condition. Wear this during winter to stay warm.

name: Spashire's Whisper
description: As a mystery of one of the three great alchemists in the ancient times, his life stories have long been a taboo among people, and is propagated strictly as a heresy by the church. But who really knows the truth behind it.
effect: Dmg to undead monsters ＋10%,For Refining ＋1, Dmg to undead monsters ＋1%

name: Spashire's Whisper Blueprint
description: As a mystery of one of the three great alchemists in the ancient times, his life stories have long been a taboo among people, and is propagated strictly as a heresy by the church. But who really knows the truth behind it.

name: Spear of Longinus
description: Contains huge amount of energy, able to penetrate A.T. Field

name: Spearfish Pike [1]
description: Marine swordfish, with fresh meat and delicate texture, can be served as sashimi. It has a high economic value and the frozen ones are very hard.

name: Spearfish Pike [2]
description: A kind of swordfish living in the sea, Delicious and tender, can be used as raw fish, with high economic value, very tough because of being frozen.

name: Special Black Tea
description: Add Prontera's milk to the hot black tea, the milk and tea are closely combined to create an attractive taste. Drinking it restores 20% of Max HP, the recovery value is according to the actual HP in GVG. This item can only be used in the PVP maps.
